author: Tunchaiun
title: Avatar Wiki
text:
What's New December 25, 2016 A behind the scenes preview of Pandora: The World of Avatar premieres during the television airing of Disney Parks Magical Christmas Celebration. [1] Disney posts the clip onto their Disney Parks YouTube channel. [2] December 13, 2016 Dark Horse reveals a special Free Comic Book Day 2017 issue of their upcoming Avatar comic , written by Sherri L. Smith with art by Doug Wheatley . [3] December 10, 2016 In an interview with Superhero Hype, Sigourney Weaver mentions seeing three of the four scripts for the upcoming sequels. She also mentions James Cameron shooting "experimental" footage that might not make it to the official film releases. [4] December 7, 2016 Avatar: Discover Pandora opens in Taipei. November 19, 2016 Walt Disney Parks & Resorts Chairman releases more details about Pandora: The World of Avatar and announces its opening on summer of 2017. [5] October 4, 2016 Toruk announces a short tour leg in Mexico during 2017, starting with Guadalajara in February. [6] September 30, 2016 An internal casting call goes out at Disney regarding Pandora: The World of Avatar . Details of the call reveals the concern about creating an immersive experience, like requiring the cast to learn Na'vi. [7] September 08, 2016 In an interview, James Cameron reveals what the Avatar sequels will be about. [8] August 29, 2016 Stephen Lang states that the second film is still on track for the 2018 release date. [9] July 23, 2016 Cameron briefly discusses Avatar at Comic-Con, discussing how the project moved from a trilogy to a pentalogy. [10] June 29, 2016 Gamespot reveal a new Avatar MMO is in development by Kabam. The game will be for mobiles. [11] 
For an archive of older news, see the timeline of real-world events . Latest Blog Posts
